home.mainTitle: Fréquence 440, your stepping stone to sustainability
home.introText: For people and companies who want more sustainability and resilience, and who ask themselves: where can I start?
home.welcomeSentence: I offer customized services and resources for all

rightTop.mainGoal: For companies and Higher Ed Institutions

clients.title: My customers
clients.sentence: I have had the pleasure to work with various organizations

1.sentence: As for me, I found Léa to be very instructive about the messages she conveys. She realized that participants didn’t have comprehensive prior knowledge, and that it’s hard for companies to evolve. She was not judging the group, she was focused on conveying her convictions, and we all appreciated that a lot.
1.user: VINCENT BOUETEL — IT director for Société Générale (French Bank)

2.sentence: Lea helped CentraleSupelec set up an ambitious climate training for students. I appreciated her creativity, educational approach, project management skills, and hindsight on difficult questions. Students were grateful for her clear and precise inputs, her vision, and the quality of the interaction.
2.user: CHRISTOPHE LAUX —  former Stanford Professor, and Professor at CentraleSupelec

3.sentence: Congratulations to Léa Ikkache, our nice and efficient climate coordinator, for organizing climate workshops at the Pôle Léonard de Vinci. The context: 1300 students, 70 teachers, strict sanitary rules ... A real challenge, but we succeeded together. Léa masterfully lead the project, always calmly and with a smile!
3.user: LAURE BERTRAND — Soft Skills director at the Pole Universitaire Leonard de Vinci

callToAction.catchphrase: To discuss your projects, or if you need contacts in France

manifeste.title: Manifesto
manifeste.catchphrase: My personal and researched vision of sustainability

content440.1: 440Hz is the frequency of the G3 note. It’s often used as a reference to tune instruments in a music group or orchestra.
content440.2: For a more sustainable world, we’ll need a combination of science, technology to analyze the situation and assess potential solutions; and creativity, dialogue for collaborative innovation. Music is an interesting symbol, as it involves both mathematics and creative expression.
content440.3: One can also appreciate the idea of the diversity of the instruments’ timbres that complete each other thanks to a simple note.

1.title: Engineering background
1.paragraph: — MS from Ecole Centrale Paris and Georgia Tech

2.title: Consulting Experience
2.paragraph: — Experiences in entrepreneurship and consulting in France and in the US

3.title: Mastering of sustainability projects
3.paragraph: — Creation of non-profits and active participation in numerous projects (Climate Collage, the Whale Shark Project…)

4.title: Pedagogical expertise
4.paragraph: – Creation of training for diverse audiences on subjects including: new methods of work, sustainability, diversity & inclusion…

5.title: Multidisciplinary projects
5.paragraph: – I currently work on various projects in education, sustainability, writing, music… Combining several fields and meeting people from different backgrounds allow for a wealth of ideas and hindsight

transition.subtitle: Sustainability
transition.mainTitle:
What is sustainability?
Why does it matter?
transition.description: Sustainability means facing major issues that are impacting us in the 21st century, and that were exacerbated by the COVID19 crisis
transition.catchphrase: The major challenges of the 21st century

1.title: How do we curtail climate change and the collapse of biodiversity, so that we can sustain our infrastructures and food and water resources?

2.title: How do we foresee and tackle the instability stemming from dwindling resources, from our financial system, and from threats to democracy?

3.title: How do we fight for equality?

4.title: How do we promote diversity, inclusivity and innovation?

additional.1: These subjects are intertwined, a systemic approach is key to succeed
additional.3: For a person, or a company, the task might seem daunting. But some initiatives at a local scale can prove extremely relevant in order to:
additional.5: Improve our resilience, our ability to survive shocks

callToAction.3: Companies and Higher education Institutions can act too.

first.3: Build together and bring together around your core values

second.1: Conduct a carbon footprint analysis and reduce your emissions

third.1: Encourage innovation and empower your teams

fourth.2: Provide healthy, local and sustainable food for your teams

1.title: Data collected on this website
1.paragraph: The data collected on this website include and are limited to the data you provide through the contact form and quote request form. This data will never be shared outside Frequence 440. The data is stored in a secured computer for up to 2 years, for the purpose of business development of Frequence 440. In accordance with the GDPR, you can ask to receive a copy, modify or delete your information at all time -send the request through our contact form.

2.title: Data collected during a consulting job
2.paragraph: Each consulting contract or quote includes information about the use, duration of storage, and possibility to access, modify or delete the data collected during the mission.
